text: 12:33 1 Samuel 15:22; Hosea 6:6; Matyu 22:37; Luk 10:27E uan navir averiam ko, uan nɨghnɨzim ko uan gavgavimɨn Ekiam gifongegh, egh uabɨ gifongezɨ moghɨn, gumazamizir igharazibagh ifongegh. E arazir kamningɨn gɨn mangɨtɨ, arazir kamning ofan me bar avimɨn tueba ko ofa damuamin biziba bar dagh afiragham.”
